title: Rand Jumps to Three-Year High as South Africa Momentum Builds
description: South Africa’s rand kicked off the new year by climbing to the strongest level since 2022, backed by upbeat South African trends, including continuing economic reforms and rising metals prices.
content: South Africa’s rand kicked off the new year by climbing to the strongest level since 2022, backed by upbeat South African trends, including continuing economic reforms and rising metals prices.
